file_content.text: Still can't believe the Empire was willing to spend turrets and repair droids on this. I'll get SIS to look into it.
Outstanding. I'll get our retrieval teams out there on the double. Those weapons will save our hides.
I owe you much more than this, but I hope you'll take it anyway. Thank you.
Be careful out there. Those turrets will still be operational while you're taking out the repair droids.
Blast it! A whole weapons shipment shot down! Seems like the Imperials finally got a decent gunner.
Two hundred missiles, three thousand blaster rifles, enough explosives to knock out a heavy walker brigade--and the enemy's swarming all over 'em.
The lousy Imperials must've been planning this for weeks. They've set up turrets to protect their scavenging crews, and droids to repair the turrets.
Almost a small army.
No kidding. I've ordered my people to keep their distance, but we're running out of time.
They're up to something.
Right, and I don't want to find out just why they want all those weapons.
We need to retaliate, Major.
I have a strategy, sir, but it hinges on forces I don't have. Unless... you'd like to assist.
Imperial subtlety at work.
Tell me about it. They must want those weapons bad, maybe they have something planned.
They brought in turrets and repair droids, just for some weapons? Seems excessive.
That's overkill.
You can't argue with the results. Our own retrieval crews can't get close.
Do your job and handle it.
I'm not a miracle worker. I need any resource I can find to get those weapons back. Including outside help.
The turrets are the real headache; the droids keep them firing whatever we do. But, destroy those droids, and the turrets are easy pickings.
I hate to ask, but if you're here, you must be handy in a fight. You might be able to slip through and take those turrets out.
Count me in.
Count me in.
Remember, hit the repair droids first. Without them, the turrets are vulnerable.
No backup?
You'll be fine as long as you hit the repair droids first. Otherwise, you're effectively facing endless reinforcements.
Don't worry about the weapons shipment; we'll send a crew once it's all clear. Good luck!
Not happening. [Refuse quest]
Then move along. I've got to work this problem myself.
Sorry. This report demands my full attention.
